${ModID}:BindingChains.NAME: Binding Chains
${ModID}:BindingChains.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FreezingVenom.NAME: Freezing Venom
${ModID}:FreezingVenom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite and Poison to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:EssenceGrasp.NAME: Essence Grasp
${ModID}:EssenceGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each of ${ModID}:Ignite, ${ModID}:Frostbite, and Poison the enemy has.

${ModID}:ArmorOfMalice.NAME: Armor of Malice
${ModID}:ArmorOfMalice.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times the number of unique debuffs on ALL enemies.

${ModID}:AllIsFire.NAME: All is Fire
${ModID}:AllIsFire.DESCRIPTION: Convert all ${ModID}:Frostbite and Poison to ${ModID}:Ignite. NL Increase the enemy's ${ModID}:Ignite by 50%. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
${ModID}:AllIsFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert all ${ModID}:Frostbite and Poison to ${ModID}:Ignite. NL Double the enemy's ${ModID}:Ignite. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${ModID}:GrowingFlames.NAME: Growing Flames
${ModID}:GrowingFlames.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! ${ModID}:Ignite to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:CobrasGift.NAME: Cobra's Gift
${ModID}:CobrasGift.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
